product_name: Easton Mountain Products Compact Carbon 5 Trekking Poles - Pair
long_description: The Easton Mountain Products Compact Carbon 5 Trekking Poles offer advanced performance and pack down small so you can move through the wilderness with little extra weight and a stable stride. High-strength, lightweight carbon fiber construction; super compact design for easy packing. Patented Rock-Lock(TM) system helps ensure fast and easy adjustment. Premium ultralight EVA ergo grips with performance extensions; easy-adjust performance wrist straps. Fast and easy deployment with tool-free adjustment. The Easton Mountain Products Ultralight Carbon 3 Trekking Poles feature ultralight integrated trail baskets and carbide tips.
short_description: The Easton Mountain Products Compact Carbon 5 Trekking Poles offer advanced performance and pack down small so you can move through the wilderness with little extra weight and a stable stride.
